articles.author: etimes.in
articles.title: What a glass of lukewarm water in the morning does to your body - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Drinking a glass of lukewarm water or tepid water in the morning can have several beneficial effects on the body:
articles.content: Lukewarm water can help relax muscles and alleviate tension, providing relief from muscle stiffness, cramps, and soreness, especially after physical activity or a restless night's sleep.

articles.title: Bengaluru braces for summer showers after intense heatwave: IMD weather predictions bring hope - The Times of India
articles.description: Bengaluru residents can expect relief from the scorching heat as IMD predicts 'light to moderate' summer rainfall post Ugadi. The forecast brings hope for normal to above-normal rainfall in the region, with thunderstorms and gusty winds expected.
